00050 bool StatsGen::readFromDataset(char *dataset, char *output) {
00051 
00052     getTime(&t1);
00053     cout.precision(4);
00054 
00055     string line;
00056     int ntriples = 0;
00057 
00058     // Input File/Pipe management
00059     FILE *filePipe;
00060     std::string pipeCommand;
00061     istream *input;
00062     ifstream *fileStream = NULL;
00063     boost::fdistream *pipeStream = NULL;
00064 
00065     // RDF Parser
00066     RDFSyntaxMediator rdfmediator;
00067     DictionaryTriples dictionaryTriples;
00068 
00069     t_encoding = PLAIN;
00070     mapping = MAPPING1;
00071     parsing = PSO;
00072 
00073     // Performing HDT on the set of properties
00074     // ***************************************
00075 
00076     // 1) Opening the dataset
00077     string datasetName(dataset);
00078 
00079     if (stringHasEnding(datasetName, ".gz")) {
00080         pipeCommand = "gunzip -c ";
00081     } else if (stringHasEnding(datasetName, ".bz2")) {
00082         pipeCommand = "bunzip2 -c ";
00083     }
00084 
00085     if (pipeCommand.length() > 0) {
00086         pipeCommand.append(datasetName);
00087 
00088         if ((filePipe = popen(pipeCommand.c_str(), "r")) == NULL) {
00089             throw "popen() failed";
00090         }
00091 
00092         input = pipeStream = new boost::fdistream(fileno(filePipe));
00093     } else {
00094         input = fileStream = new ifstream(datasetName.c_str());
00095     }
00096     if (!input->good()) {
00097         cout << "   <ERROR> Please check the dataset in " << datasetName
00098                 << endl;
00099         return false;
00100     }
00101 
00102     // 2) Testing dictionary options: it is built on a first pass
00103     //    which gathers statistics and performs the chosen ordering.
00104     //    First, the ordering parameter is retrieved and next the
00105     //    chosen dictionary class is instantiated.
00106     getTime(&t2);
00107     cout << "[" << showpoint << t2.user - t1.user
00108             << "]  Building Dictionary from " << datasetName << endl;
00109 
00110     // New plain dictionary with the by default size.
00111     dictionary = new PlainDictionary();
00112 
00113     // Parse
00114     if (1) {
00115         node = new string[3];
00116 
00117         while (getline(*input, line)) {
00118             //cout << "> " << line << endl;
00119             ntriples++;
00120             parseTripleN3(line);
00121             dictionary->checkTriple(node);
00122         }
00123     } else {
00124         dictionaryTriples.dictionary = dictionary;
00125         dictionaryTriples.triples = NULL;
00126         dictionaryTriples.ntriples = new int();
00127         *dictionaryTriples.ntriples = 0;
00128         rdfmediator.parsing(const_cast<char*> (dataset), dictionaryTriples);
00129         ntriples = *dictionaryTriples.ntriples;
00130     }
00131 
00132     // 3) Sorting Dictionary (LEXICOGRAPHIC)
00133     //    Retrieve the id mapping choice
00134     getTime(&t2);
00135     cout << "[" << showpoint << t2.user - t1.user << "]  Split Dictionary"
00136             << endl;
00137 
00138     dictionary->split();
00139 
00140     // 3) Sorting Dictionary (LEXICOGRAPHIC)
00141     //    Retrieve the id mapping choice
00142     getTime(&t2);
00143     cout << "[" << showpoint << t2.user - t1.user << "]  Sorting Dictionary"
00144             << endl;
00145 
00146     dictionary->lexicographicSort(mapping);
00147 
00148     // 4) Testing triples options: it is built on a second pass.
00149     //    The graph parsing is retrieved and the object is 
00150     //    instantiated by according with the encoding choice. The
00151     //    resultant structure is finally sorted on parsing choice.
00152     getTime(&t2);
00153     cout << "[" << showpoint << t2.user - t1.user << "]  Building Triples"
00154             << endl;
00155 
00156     // FIXME: Needed?
00157     if (pipeCommand.length() > 0) { // Cannot seek on pipes
00158         // Close old pipe
00159         delete pipeStream;
00160         pclose(filePipe);
00161 
00162         // Create new one from the begining
00163         if ((filePipe = popen(pipeCommand.c_str(), "r")) == NULL) {
00164             throw "popen() failed";
00165         }
00166 
00167         input = pipeStream = new boost::fdistream(fileno(filePipe));
00168 
00169     } else {
00170         input->clear();
00171         input->seekg(0, ios::beg);
00172     }
00173 
00174     // PLAIN triples
00175     triples = new PlainTriples(dictionary, ntriples, parsing);
00176 
00178     // COMPACT triples  
00179     //triples = new CompactTriples(dictionary, ntriples, parsing);
00180     //t_encoding = COMPACT;
00181 
00182     // BITMAP triples   
00183     //triples = new BitmapTriples(dictionary, ntriples, parsing);
00184     //t_encoding = BITMAP;
00185 
00186 
00187     int subject, predicate, object;
00188 
00189     if (1) {
00190         while (getline(*input, line)) {
00191             parseTripleN3(line);
00192 
00193             subject = dictionary->retrieveID(node[0], VOC_SUBJECT);
00194             predicate = dictionary->retrieveID(node[1], VOC_PREDICATE);
00195             object = dictionary->retrieveID(node[2], VOC_OBJECT);
00196 
00197             triples->insert(subject, predicate, object);
00198 
00199             //          cout << subject << "," << predicate << "," << object <<endl;
00200         }
00201     } else {
00202         rdfmediator;
00203         dictionaryTriples.triples = triples;
00204         rdfmediator.parsing(const_cast<char*> (dataset), dictionaryTriples);
00205 
00206     }
00207     ntriples = triples->size();
00208 
00209     getTime(&t2);
00210     cout << "[" << showpoint << t2.user - t1.user << "]  Sort triples" << endl;
00211 
00212     triples->graphSort();
00213 
00214     // 6) Writing Dictionary
00215     getTime(&t2);
00216     int separator = '\n';
00217     string dictPath(output);
00218     dictPath.append("/hdt");
00219     cout << "[" << showpoint << t2.user - t1.user
00220             << "]  Writing Dictionary to: " << dictPath << endl;
00221 
00222     mkpathfile(dictPath.c_str(), 0744);
00223     dictionary->write(dictPath, separator);
00224 
00225     // 7) Writing Triples
00226     //    Returns the number of triples effectively writen (note
00227     //    that the original dataset can contain repeated triples)
00228     getTime(&t2);
00229     string triplePath(output);
00230     triplePath.append("/hdt");
00231     cout << "[" << showpoint << t2.user - t1.user << "]  Writing Triples to "
00232             << triplePath << endl;
00233     ntriples = triples->write(triplePath);
00234 
00235     // 8) Writing Header
00236     getTime(&t2);
00237     string headerPath(output);
00238     headerPath.append("/hdt");
00239     cout << "[" << showpoint << t2.user - t1.user << "]  Writing Header to "
00240             << headerPath << endl;
00241 
00242     header = new Header(parsing, mapping, separator, t_encoding,
00243             dictionary->getNsubjects(), dictionary->getNpredicates(),
00244             dictionary->getNobjects(), dictionary->getSsubobj(), ntriples,
00245             dictionary->getNLiterals(), dictionary->getMaxID());
00246     header->write(headerPath);
00247 
00248     // Close
00249     if (pipeCommand.length() > 0) {
00250         delete pipeStream;
00251         input = NULL;
00252         pclose(filePipe);
00253     } else {
00254         fileStream->close();
00255         delete fileStream;
00256         input = NULL;
00257     }
00258 
00259     delete[] node;
00260 
00261     return true;
00262 }

00269 bool StatsGen::readFromHDT(char *hdt, char*output) {
00270     DataTime t1, t2;
00271     getTime(&t1);
00272     cout.precision(4);
00273 
00274     cout << "[" << showpoint << t1.user - t1.user << "]  Loading HDT" << endl;
00275 
00276     getTime(&t2);
00277     cout << "[" << showpoint << t2.user - t1.user << "]  Reading Header from: "
00278             << hdt << endl;
00279     header = new Header();
00280     header->read(hdt);
00281 
00282     getTime(&t2);
00283     cout << "[" << showpoint << t2.user - t1.user
00284             << "]  Loading Dictionary from: " << hdt << endl;
00285 
00286     int mapping = header->getMapping();
00287 
00288     dictionary = new PlainDictionary(hdt, mapping, header->getD_separator(),
00289             header->getNsubjects(), header->getNpredicates(),
00290             header->getNobjects(), header->getSsubobj());
00291 
00292     getTime(&t2);
00293     cout << "[" << showpoint << t2.user - t1.user
00294             << "]  Loading Triples from: " << hdt << endl;
00295     switch (header->getT_encoding()) {
00296     case PLAIN:
00297         triples = new PlainTriples(dictionary, header->getNtriples(),
00298                 header->getParsing(), hdt);
00299         break;
00300     case COMPACT:
00301         triples = new CompactTriples(dictionary, header->getNtriples(),
00302                 header->getParsing(), hdt);
00303         break;
00304     case BITMAP:
00305         triples = new BitmapTriples(dictionary, header->getNtriples(),
00306                 header->getParsing(), hdt);
00307         break;
00308     case K2TREE:
00309         cout
00310                 << "   <WARNING> K2-tree Triples encoding is not currently supported"
00311                 << endl;
00312         return false;
00313         break;
00314     default:
00315         cout << "   <ERROR> Current triples encoding  is not supported" << endl;
00316         return false;
00317     }
00318 
00319     triples->loadGraphMemory();
00320 
00321     getTime(&t2);
00322     cout << "[" << showpoint << t2.user - t1.user << "] HDT Succesfully loaded"
00323             << endl;
00324 
00325     return true;
00326 }

00332 bool StatsGen::process(char *output) {
00333     // Save parsings
00334     for (int pars = 1; pars <= 6; pars++) {
00335         triples->convertParsing(pars);
00336 
00337         getTime(&t2);
00338         string plainPath(output);
00339         plainPath.append("/hdt_");
00340         plainPath.append(parsingTypeStr[pars]);
00341         plainPath.append("_plain");
00342         cout << "[" << showpoint << t2.user - t1.user
00343                 << "]  Saving PlainTriples on " << plainPath << endl;
00344         PlainTriples::write(triples->getGraph(), plainPath);
00345 
00346         getTime(&t2);
00347         string compactPath(output);
00348         compactPath.append("/hdt_");
00349         compactPath.append(parsingTypeStr[pars]);
00350         compactPath.append("_compact");
00351         cout << "[" << showpoint << t2.user - t1.user
00352                 << "]  Saving CompactTriples on " << compactPath << endl;
00353         CompactTriples::write(triples->getGraph(), compactPath);
00354 
00355         getTime(&t2);
00356         string bitmapPath(output);
00357         bitmapPath.append("/hdt_");
00358         bitmapPath.append(parsingTypeStr[pars]);
00359         bitmapPath.append("_bitmap");
00360         cout << "[" << showpoint << t2.user - t1.user
00361                 << "]  Saving BitmapTriples on " << bitmapPath << endl;
00362         BitmapTriples::write(triples->getGraph(), bitmapPath);
00363     }
00364 
00365     // 9) Checking optional gnuplot generation
00366     triples->convertParsing(PSO);
00367     string gnuplotPath(output);
00368     gnuplotPath.append("/nocluster/");
00369     mkpathfile(gnuplotPath.c_str(), 0744);
00370 
00371     getTime(&t2);
00372     cout << "[" << showpoint << t2.user - t1.user
00373             << "]  Generating Gnuplot on " << gnuplotPath << endl;
00374 
00375     int max = dictionary->getMaxID();
00376     int npredicates = dictionary->getNpredicates();
00377     vector < string > predicates(npredicates + 1);
00378 
00379     for (int i = 1; i <= npredicates; i++) {
00380         string p = dictionary->retrieveString(i, VOC_PREDICATE);
00381         predicates[i] = p;
00382     }
00383     triples->gnuplot(npredicates, predicates, max, gnuplotPath.c_str());
00384 
00385     // 11) Cluster
00386     triples->convertParsing(PSO);
00387     getTime(&t2);
00388     cout << "[" << showpoint << t2.user - t1.user << "]  Clustering" << endl;
00389     ClusterAlgorithm1 cluster;
00390     cluster.startClustering(triples);
00391     cluster.doClusteringIteration(0);
00392 
00393     // 12) Writing Dictionary
00394     getTime(&t2);
00395     string dictPath = output;
00396     dictPath.append("/hdt_cluster");
00397     cout << "[" << showpoint << t2.user - t1.user
00398             << "]  Writing Clustered Dictionary to: " << dictPath << endl;
00399     dictionary->write(dictPath, header->getD_separator());
00400 
00401     // 13) Writing Triples
00402     //    Returns the number of triples effectively writen (note
00403     //    that the original dataset can contain repeated triples)
00404     getTime(&t2);
00405     string triplePath = output;
00406     triplePath.append("/hdt_cluster");
00407     cout << "[" << showpoint << t2.user - t1.user
00408             << "]  Writing Clustered Triples to " << triplePath << endl;
00409     int ntriples = triples->write(triplePath);
00410 
00411     // 14) Writing Header
00412     getTime(&t2);
00413     string headerPath = output;
00414     headerPath.append("/hdt_cluster");
00415     cout << "[" << showpoint << t2.user - t1.user
00416             << "]  Writing Clustered Header to " << headerPath << endl;
00417 
00418     /*  header = new Header(parsing, mapping, separator, t_encoding,
00419      dictionary->getNsubjects(), dictionary->getNpredicates(), dictionary->getNobjects(), dictionary->getSsubobj(),
00420      ntriples, dictionary->getMaxID());*/
00421     header->write(headerPath);
00422 
00423     // 15) Clustered GNUPLOT
00424     gnuplotPath = output;
00425     gnuplotPath.append("/cluster/");
00426     mkpathfile(gnuplotPath.c_str(), 0744);
00427     getTime(&t2);
00428     cout << "[" << showpoint << t2.user - t1.user
00429             << "]  Generating Clustered Gnuplot on " << gnuplotPath << endl;
00430 
00431     if (1) {
00432         int max = dictionary->getMaxID();
00433         int npredicates = dictionary->getNpredicates();
00434         vector < string > predicates(npredicates + 1);
00435 
00436         for (int i = 1; i <= npredicates; i++) {
00437             string p = dictionary->retrieveString(i, VOC_PREDICATE);
00438             predicates[i] = p;
00439         }
00440         triples->gnuplot(npredicates, predicates, max, gnuplotPath.c_str());
00441     }
00442 
00443     // Dictionary stats
00444     getTime(&t2);
00445     string dictStats(output);
00446     dictStats.append("/dictstats");
00447     cout << "[" << showpoint << t2.user - t1.user
00448             << "]  Calculate Dictionary Statistics on " << dictStats << endl;
00449     mkpathfile((dictStats).c_str(), 0744);
00450     dictionary->dumpStats(dictStats);
00451 
00452     // 10) Degree
00453     getTime(&t2);
00454     string degreePath(output);
00455     degreePath.append("/degree");
00456     cout << "[" << showpoint << t2.user - t1.user
00457             << "]  Calculate Degree Metrics on " << degreePath << endl;
00458     mkpathfile((degreePath).c_str(), 0744);
00459     triples->calculateDegrees(degreePath);
00460 
00461     getTime(&t2);
00462     string predPath(output);
00463     predPath.append("/predicateHistogram");
00464     cout << "[" << showpoint << t2.user - t1.user
00465             << "]  Calculate Predicate Histogram on " << predPath << endl;
00466     mkpathfile((predPath).c_str(), 0744);
00467     triples->convertParsing(PSO);
00468     triples->calculatePredicateHistogram(predPath);
00469 
00470     // All done
00471     getTime(&t2);
00472     cout << "[" << showpoint << t2.user - t1.user << "]  All done" << endl;
00473 
00474     return true;
00475 }
00476 
00481 void StatsGen::parseTripleN3(string t) {
00482     string value = t;
00483     int pos = 0;
00484     int firstIndex = 0;
00485     int lastIndex = 0;
00486     bool errorParsing = false;
00487 
00488     node[0] = "";
00489     node[1] = "";
00490     node[2] = "";
00491 
00492     while (true) {
00493         value = value.substr(firstIndex);
00494 
00495         if (value == "." || value == "\n" || value == "" || value.at(0) == '#')
00496             break;
00497 
00498         //obvious space 
00499         if (value.at(0) == ' ') {
00500             //do nothing
00501             lastIndex = 0;
00502         }
00503         //URI   
00504         else if (value.at(0) == '<') {
00505             lastIndex = value.find(">");
00506             //check size of pos
00507             if (pos > 2) {
00508                 errorParsing = true;
00509                 break;
00510             }
00511             node[pos] = value.substr(0, lastIndex + 1);
00512             pos++;
00513         }
00514         //Literal  
00515         else if (value.at(0) == '"') {
00516             lastIndex = value.find('"', 1);
00517             //check if literal is escaped
00518             while (true) {
00519                 bool escaped = false;
00520                 int temp = lastIndex - 1;
00521 
00522                 while (temp > 0 && value.at(temp) == '\\') {
00523                     if (escaped)
00524                         escaped = false;
00525                     else
00526                         escaped = true;
00527                     temp--;
00528                 }
00529 
00530                 if (!escaped)
00531                     break;
00532                 lastIndex++;
00533                 if (lastIndex == value.length())
00534                     //Cannot find the (unescaped) end
00535                     errorParsing = true;
00536                 lastIndex = value.find('"', lastIndex);
00537                 if (lastIndex == string::npos)
00538                     //Cannot find the (unescaped) end
00539                     errorParsing = true;
00540             }
00541 
00542             // literal can extend to a bit more than just the ",
00543             // also take into account lang and datatype strings
00544             if (value.at(lastIndex + 1) == '@') {
00545                 // find end of literal/lang tag
00546                 lastIndex = value.find(' ', lastIndex + 1) - 1;
00547             } else if (value.at(lastIndex + 1) == '^') {
00548                 lastIndex = value.find('>', lastIndex + 1);
00549             }
00550             //check size of pos
00551             if (pos > 2) {
00552                 errorParsing = true;
00553                 break;
00554             }
00555             node[pos] = value.substr(0, lastIndex + 1);
00556             pos++;
00557         }
00558         //blank, a variable, a relative predicate
00559         else if (value.at(0) == '_' || (value.find(":") != string::npos)) {
00560             lastIndex = value.find(" ");
00561             //check size of pos
00562             if (pos > 2) {
00563                 errorParsing = true;
00564                 break;
00565             }
00566             node[pos] = value.substr(0, lastIndex);
00567             pos++;
00568         }
00569         //parameter or variable ---> obviate for Triples. In future, add to a Hash
00570         else if (value.at(0) == '@' || value.at(0) == '?') {
00571             break;
00572         }
00573         // test if number 
00574         else {
00575             // else it is a parsing error
00576             lastIndex = value.find(" ");
00577             for (int j = 0; j < lastIndex; j++) {
00578                 if (!isdigit(value.at(j)) && value.at(j) != '.' && value.at(j)
00579                         != ',') {
00580                     errorParsing = true;
00581                 }
00582             }
00583 
00584             if (errorParsing == false) {
00585                 node[pos] = value.substr(0, lastIndex);
00586                 pos++;
00587             }
00588 
00589             break;
00590         }
00591 
00592         firstIndex = lastIndex + 1;
00593     }
00594 
00595     if (errorParsing == true) {
00596         char* except =
00597                 (char*) " :*********** FORMAT ERROR (NOT N3?) ***********";
00598         throw except;
00599     } else if (pos != 0 && pos != 3) {
00600         char* except =
00601                 (char*) " :*********** FORMAT ERROR (NOT N3?) ***********";
00602         throw except;
00603     }
00604 }
00605 
00607 StatsGen::~StatsGen() {
00608     delete header;
00609     delete dictionary;
00610     delete triples;
00611 }
Generated on Mon Feb 21 2011 17:32:03 for HDT-it by  1.7.1
